item.title: 苹果高管预热 MacBook 新品
item.guid: 苹果高管预热-MacBook-新品
item.description:
Early this morning, Apple's Senior Vice President of Worldwide Marketing, Greg Joswiak, released new product warm-up information, stating that "something powerful is coming." 今天凌晨，苹果市场营销高级副总裁 Greg Joswiak 发布新品预热信息，并称「有件强大的东西即将到来」。

The information he released indicates that the new product will be a brand-new MacBook Pro. Furthermore, from the preview content, it can be seen that the MacBook in the video is arranged in a "V" shape, which may suggest it will be equipped with the new M5 processor. 从其公布的信息显示，新品将为全新的 MacBook Pro 新品。并且从预告内容可以看出，视频中的 MacBook 摆出了「V」的造型，这或暗示其将搭载全新 M5 处理器。

According to previous leaks, Apple will release the M5 MacBook Pro and iPad Pro this week. 据此前消息爆料，苹果将会在本周发布 M5 的 MacBook Pro 以及 iPad Pro。

Recently, Russian YouTube blogger Wylsacom got an M5 iPad Pro unit in advance and revealed some of the M5's performance details: 近期，俄罗斯 YouTube 博主 Wylsacom 提前拿到了 M5 iPad Pro 实机并公布了 M5 的部分性能情况：

The M5 chip on the iPad Pro features a 9-core CPU, consistent with the previous generation. It scored 4133 in single-core Benchmark and 15437 in multi-core, representing an approximate 10% and 16% improvement respectively compared to the M4.

As for the GPU, the M5 made significant strides: its Benchmark Metal score was 74568, a substantial increase of about 34% compared to the previous generation's 55702.

Additionally, the iPad Pro Wylsacom had was the 256GB version, and Benchmark showed it was equipped with 12GB of RAM. In comparison, the 256GB and 512GB M4 iPad Pro models came with 8GB of RAM. 另外，Wylsacom 手上的 iPad Pro 为 256GB 版本，Benchmark 显示配备运行内存 12GB，作为对比，M4 iPad Pro 的 256GB 和 512GB 配备了 8GB 运存。

item.title: 英伟达开售全球最小 AI 超级计算机，黄仁勋给马斯克「送货上门」
item.guid: 英伟达开售全球最小-AI-超级计算机，黄仁勋给马斯克「送货上门」
item.description:
Yesterday, NVIDIA posted on its official website, announcing the official sale of DGX Spark, a desktop-grade product touted as "the world's smallest AI supercomputer." 昨天，NVIDIA 在官网发文，宣布正式开售 DGX Spark，这是一款号称「全球最小 AI 超级计算机」的桌面级产品。

On the day of the sale, the first device was personally delivered by NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang to Elon Musk at SpaceX's Starbase facility. 开售当天，首台设备由 NVIDIA CEO 黄仁勋亲手交付给 Elon Musk，地点选在 SpaceX 的 Starbase 基地。

It is reported that DGX Spark is based on the Grace Blackwell architecture, offering 1 Petaflop of AI performance per machine, equipped with 128GB of unified memory, capable of running inference models with up to 200 billion parameters locally, and supporting fine-tuning of 70 billion parameter models. 据悉， DGX Spark 基于 Grace Blackwell 架构，单机可提供 1 Petaflop AI 性能，配备 128GB 统一内存，能够在本地运行高达 2000 亿参数的推理模型，并支持对 700 亿参数模型进行微调。

The official statement emphasizes that this product is aimed at developers, researchers, and creators, designed to bring supercomputer-level computing power to the desktop. 官方强调，该产品面向开发者、研究人员与创作者，旨在将超级计算机级别的算力带到桌面。

Jensen Huang stated: "In 2016, we launched DGX-1 and delivered it to OpenAI at the time. That machine spawned ChatGPT and ignited the AI revolution. Today, DGX Spark will once again bring supercomputers to developers' desktops, sparking a new round of breakthroughs." 黄仁勋表示：「2016 年我们推出 DGX-1，并交付给当时的 OpenAI，那台机器催生了 ChatGPT，开启了 AI 革命。如今 DGX Spark 将再次把超级计算机放到开发者桌面，点燃新一轮突破。」

Musk also responded on X, saying: "This DGX Spark is about 100 times more energy-efficient than the DGX-1DGX-1 Jensen Huang delivered to me in 2016, which was the first dedicated AI computer in history." 马斯克也在 X 上回应称：「这台 DGX Spark 的能效比黄仁勋 2016 年交付给我的 DGX-1DGX-1 高出约 100 倍，那是史上第一台专用 AI 计算机」。

It is reported that DGX Spark will be simultaneously launched in system versions by manufacturers such as Acer, ASUS, Dell, GIGABYTE, HP, Lenovo, and MSI, covering the global market. 据悉，DGX Spark 将由宏碁、华硕、戴尔、技嘉、惠普、联想、微星等厂商同步推出系统版本，覆盖全球市场。

The first batch of devices has also been delivered to companies and research institutions such as SpaceX, Google, Meta, Microsoft, and Hugging Face. 首批设备也已交付给 SpaceX、谷歌、Meta、微软、Hugging Face 等企业和研究机构。

DGX Spark will be available for order starting October 15th on NVIDIA's official website and through partner channels. DGX Spark 将于 10 月 15 日起在 NVIDIA 官网及合作渠道开启订购。

item.title: eSIM 手机加速落地：移动、联通、电信公布办理细则
item.guid: eSIM-手机加速落地：移动、联通、电信公布办理细则
item.description:
Recently, China Mobile, China Unicom, and China Telecom, the three major operators, have successively announced the launch of eSIM-related business processing. 近日，中国移动、中国联通和中国电信三大运营商先后官宣启动 eSIM 相关业务的办理。

Currently, all three major operators require the user to visit a business hall in person to apply for an eSIM. Only users aged 18 and above are eligible, and each device can activate a maximum of 2 numbers per month, with restrictions on the number of card replacements. 目前， 三大运营商办理 eSIM 均需要本人前往营业厅办理，仅 18 周岁以上用户可办，且每台设备每月最多开通 2 个号码，补换卡次数亦存在限制。

Regarding document support, China Unicom offers the widest range. For mainland residents, it supports ID cards, household registration books, and passports. For Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan compatriots, as well as foreigners in China, it supports Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan travel permits, residence permits, and permanent residence ID cards for foreigners. 在证件支持方面，中国联通支持的范围最广泛。对于大陆居民支持身份证、户口簿和护照，对于港澳台同胞以及在华外国人，则支持港澳台通行证、居住证，以及外国人永久居留身份证。

However, China Mobile and China Telecom support fewer types of documents, only accepting ID cards (for mainland residents) or permanent residence ID cards for foreigners. Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan compatriots can only use residence permits to apply for cards and travel permits are not supported. 而移动和电信支持的证件类型就相对少一些，仅支持使用身份证（大陆居民）或外国人永久居留身份证，港澳台同胞则只能使用居住证办卡，不支持通行证。

As the first model to support eSIM technology in the domestic market, Apple iPhone Air will begin pre-sales at 9 AM this Friday and officially go on sale next Wednesday. The support for domestic and international eSIMs on the iPhone Air Chinese mainland version, Hong Kong/Macau version, and overseas versions is also a concern for many friends: 作为首款在国内市场支持 eSIM 技术的机型，苹果 iPhone Air 将于本周五 9 点开启预售，下周三正式发售，而 iPhone Air 国行、港澳版和海外版对于境内外 eSIM 的支持情况，也是很多朋友关心的问题：

    The iPhone Air itself supports up to 8 eSIM numbers, but only a maximum of 2 numbers can be activated in mainland China;

    Overseas version Air: Can roam domestically, but cannot activate domestic numbers;

    Chinese mainland version Air: Can roam abroad, and can activate overseas numbers after going abroad.

Specifically: 具体来说：

    Chinese mainland version + domestic card: ✅

    Chinese mainland version + domestic card abroad: ✅ (depending on the operator, no difference from the physical card era)

    Chinese mainland version + foreign card abroad: ✅ (requires physical location abroad before adding)

    Chinese version + foreign card in China: ❌

    Hong Kong/Macau version + Hong Kong/Macau card: ✅ (Normal roaming in mainland China)

    Hong Kong/Macau version + Chinese card: ❌ (Future support is slim)

    International version + foreign card: ✅ (Normal roaming in mainland China)

    International version + Chinese card: ❌ (Lacks dedicated CI root certificate, cannot be used)

eSIM technology integrates traditional physical SIM card functions into the phone's chip, allowing users to complete network access, card changes, card replacement, suspension/resumption, cancellation, and number portability services without inserting a card. Compared to physical cards, eSIM offers advantages such as space-saving, waterproof and lightweight design, and remote download activation. eSIM 技术将传统实体 SIM 卡功能集成至手机芯片，用户无需插卡即可完成入网、换卡、补卡、停机/复机、销号及携号转网等业务。相比实体卡，eSIM 具备节省空间、防水轻薄、远程下载激活等优势。

Industry insiders reveal that eSIM phones from manufacturers like Huawei, OPPO, and vivo are also undergoing testing or are planned for release, and will work with Apple to promote the popularization of the "card-less era" in the future. 业内人士透露，华为、OPPO、vivo 等厂商的 eSIM 手机也已在测试或计划上市，未来将与苹果一同推动「无卡时代」的普及。

item.title: OpenAI CEO 官宣 ChatGPT 将支持成人内容
item.guid: OpenAI-CEO-官宣-ChatGPT-将支持成人内容
item.description:
Early this morning, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced that ChatGPT will release a new version in the coming weeks and will introduce a more comprehensive age rating in December, allowing ChatGPT to provide adult content. 今天凌晨，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 发文宣布，ChatGPT 将会在未来几周内发布新版本，并会在 12 月推出更为全面的年龄分级，允许 ChatGPT 提供成人内容。

Altman stated that OpenAI previously had many content restrictions on ChatGPT and maintained a cautious attitude towards mental health issues. Altman said the team realized this made many users without mental health problems feel that ChatGPT was "unpleasant" or "unenjoyable" to use, "but given the seriousness of the issue, we wanted to do this. (referring to content restrictions)" Altman 表示，此前 OpenAI 对 ChatGPT 有不少内容限制，并且对心理健康问题一直保持谨慎态度。Altman 称团队意识到这使许多没有心理健康问题的用户觉得 ChatGPT 用起来「不爽」或「不愉快」，「但鉴于问题的严重性，我们希望做到这一点。（指内容限制）」

Currently, regarding the relaxation of content restrictions, Altman revealed that OpenAI has been able to mitigate severe mental health issues and now has new tools, allowing the team to safely relax restrictions in most cases. 目前，针对开放内容限制，Altman 透露 OpenAI 已经能够减轻严重的心理健康问题，并且拥有了新的工具，团队将能够在大多数情况下安全地放宽限制。

Altman revealed that in the coming weeks, the new version of ChatGPT will be able to achieve more "human-like" response methods, "using a lot of emojis and acting like a friend." Altman also emphasized, "This is only if you want it, not because we want to maximize usage." Altman 透露，未来几周内，新版本的 ChatGPT 能够实现更有「人味」的回应方式，「能用大量的 emoji，表现得像朋友一样。」同时 Altman 也强调，「这仅在你想要的情况下，而不是因为我们想要最大化使用率。」

At the same time, Altman also announced that ChatGPT will introduce a more comprehensive age rating in December this year, as part of the principle of "treating adult users as adults." Specifically, ChatGPT will allow more content generation, such as providing adult content for adults who have passed "adult verification." 同时，Altman 还宣布，ChatGPT 将会在今年 12 月推出更全面的年龄分级，并作为「将成年用户视为成年人」原则的一部分。具体来看，ChatGPT 将允许更多内容生成，例如能够为通过「成年验证」的成年人提供色情内容。

item.title: 星舰 V2 谢幕：8 颗星链模拟器顺利部署，SpaceX 迈向 V3 时代
item.guid: 星舰-V2-谢幕：8-颗星链模拟器顺利部署，SpaceX-迈向-V3-时代
item.description:
SpaceX Starship V2 completed its final test flight, successfully deploying 8 Starlink simulators, laying the foundation for the launch of the next-generation Starlink V3 satellites. SpaceX 星舰 V2 完成最后一次试飞，携带 8 颗星链模拟器顺利部署，为下一代星链 V3 卫星发射奠定基础。

This mission was carried out by Super Heavy Booster 15 and Starship 38. During its return, the booster tested a new 5-engine landing ignition configuration, enhancing future redundancy and safety. 本次任务由超重型助推器 15 号与星舰飞船 38 号执行，助推器在返回过程中测试了全新的 5 台发动机着陆点火配置，提升了未来冗余与安全性。

Meanwhile, the spacecraft released 8 Starlink simulators weighing approximately 2000 kg each in orbit, with a total payload of about 16000 kg, and the deployment process was smooth and unobstructed. 与此同时，飞船在轨释放了 8 颗重量约 2000 公斤的星链模拟器，总载荷约 16000 公斤，部署过程流畅无阻。

Compared to the previous Falcon 9, the future Starship will have higher launch efficiency, adding approximately 60 Tbps of capacity to the Starlink network per launch, which is 20 times the capacity of a single existing launch. 与此前的猎鹰 9 号相比，未来星舰将具备更高的运载效率，每次发射可为星链网络增加约 60 Tbps 容量，相当于现有单次发射能力的 20 倍。

SpaceX stated that Starship will gradually replace Falcon 9 as the primary launch vehicle for Starlink V3 satellites. SpaceX 表示，星舰将逐步接替猎鹰 9 号，成为星链 V3 卫星的主力运载工具。

This mission also verified the ability to re-ignite Raptor engines in a space environment and conducted extreme tests on the heat shield tiles. 此次任务还验证了在太空环境下重新点燃猛禽发动机的能力，并对隔热瓦进行了极限测试。

Musk emphasized that Starship's iterative goal is to achieve "full, rapid reusability" to support future large-scale Starlink deployment and Mars exploration. 马斯克强调，星舰的迭代目标是实现「完全、快速可重复使用」，以支撑未来大规模星链部署和火星探索。

item.title: 王自如回应是否参加罗永浩播客：「咖位不够，过气网红配不上」
item.guid: 王自如回应是否参加罗永浩播客：「咖位不够，过气网红配不上」
item.description:
Wang Ziruo recently stated during a live broadcast, in response to a netizen's question, that he would not participate in Luo Yonghao's podcast program "Luo Yonghao's Crossroads." 王自如近日在直播中回应网友提问时表示，他不会参加罗永浩主持的播客节目《罗永浩的十字路口》。

Some netizens asked if Wang Ziruo would be a guest on the podcast. He frankly said: 'I just said it, my status isn't high enough, I'm an outdated internet celebrity, not worthy of Teacher Luo's crossroads.' 有网友询问王自如是否会做客该播客，他直言：「我都刚才讲了，咖位不够，过气网红，配不上罗老师的十字路口。」

Regarding the statement that 'Luo Yonghao, in a sense, held back Wang Ziruo and ZEALER,' Wang Ziruo responded: 'You're wrong, to a large extent, Teacher Luo helped Wang Ziruo and ZEALER.' 对于「罗永浩某种意义上耽误了王自如和 ZEALER」的说法，王自如则回应：「你错了，很大程度上罗老师帮了王自如和 ZEALER。」

He explained that ZEALER had to endure the harm and backlash brought by early content monetization while exploring business models, which was a unique life experience. 他解释称，ZEALER 在探索商业模式时必须承受早期内容变现带来的伤害和反噬，这是一段独特的人生经验。

Wang Ziruo also mentioned that, in fact, Luo Yonghao himself no longer cares about the controversy from back then, and he himself has long moved on. 王自如还提到，事实上罗永浩本人早已不在意当年的争议，而他自己也早就翻篇。

As early as 2014, ZEALER released a review video of the Smartisan T1, pointing out issues such as a fragile screen, cooling design flaws, and unstable quality control. 早在 2014 年，ZEALER 发布锤子 T1 评测视频，指出该机存在屏幕易碎、散热设计缺陷、品控不稳定等问题。

Luo Yonghao believed the review contained factual errors and malicious intent, and subsequently engaged in a three-hour live debate with Wang Ziruo. One line from it, 'If you're kept, don't talk about independent personality,' is still widely quoted today. 罗永浩认为评测存在事实错误和恶意倾向，随即与王自如进行了一场长达三小时的直播辩论，其中一句「被包养了就别谈独立人格」至今仍被广泛引用。

item.title: Apple TV 全新图标现身 iOS 26.1 测试版
item.guid: Apple-TV-全新图标现身-iOS-26.1-测试版
item.description:
According to MacRumors, in the latest iOS 26.1 and tvOS 26.1 betas pushed yesterday, the Apple TV app icon and interface visuals have been replaced from the original gray tones with a colorful, glass-textured effect. 据 MacRumors 报道，在昨天最新推送的 iOS 26.1 与 tvOS 26.1 测试版中，Apple TV 应用图标与界面视觉已由原本的灰色调，替换为带有玻璃质感的多彩效果。

Currently, some pages on Apple's official website still display 'Apple TV+', but the company emphasizes that it will unify the brand to 'Apple TV' in the future. 目前，苹果官网部分页面仍显示为「Apple TV+」，但公司强调未来将统一使用「Apple TV」这一品牌。

Previously, Apple quietly disclosed this change in a press release, which primarily announced that the movie 'F1' would be available on streaming platforms on December 12. The official statement was: 'Apple TV+ has been renamed Apple TV, bringing a vibrant new identity.' 此前，苹果在一份新闻稿中低调披露了这一变化，该新闻稿主要是宣布电影《F1》将于 12 月 12 日上线流媒体平台。官方表述为：「Apple TV+ 现已更名为 Apple TV，带来充满活力的新身份」。

However, this renaming may also cause some confusion. Apple already has a set-top box hardware and a content aggregation app with the same name, both using 'Apple TV' as their designation. 不过，此次更名也可能带来一定混淆。Apple 旗下已有同名的机顶盒硬件与聚合内容应用，均使用「Apple TV」作为名称。

Industry insiders recalled the confusion caused when HBO Max was renamed 'Max' in 2023, believing Apple's move might face similar challenges. 业内人士联想到 2023 年 HBO Max 更名为「Max」时引发的混乱，认为 Apple 此举或将面临类似挑战。

item.title: 苹果公布全新语言模型：长文本生成速度提升最高 128 倍
item.guid: 苹果公布全新语言模型：长文本生成速度提升最高-128-倍
item.description:
According to 9to5Mac, Apple and a research team from Ohio State University have jointly released a new study proposing a language model named 'FS-DFM (Few-Step Discrete Flow-Matching).' 据 9to5Mac 报道，苹果与俄亥俄州立大学研究团队联合发布了一项最新研究，提出名为「FS-DFM（Few-Step Discrete Flow-Matching）」的语言模型。

According to the introduction, the model shows significant advantages in long text generation, capable of producing high-quality output in just 8 iterations, with speeds up to 128 times faster than traditional methods. 据介绍， 该模型在长文本生成方面展现出显著优势，能够在仅 8 轮迭代中完成高质量输出，速度最高可比传统方法快 128 倍。

The study points out that existing mainstream large language models mostly use an autoregressive method to generate word by word, while diffusion models generate multiple tokens in parallel and gradually refine them. FS-DFM further optimizes this by leveraging 'teacher model' guidance and iterative mechanisms to achieve faster and more stable convergence. 研究指出，现有主流大语言模型多采用自回归方式逐字生成，而扩散模型则通过并行生成多个词元并逐步修正。FS-DFM 在此基础上进一步优化，借助「教师模型」指导和迭代机制改进，实现更快、更稳的收敛效果。

In comparative tests, FS-DFM's parameter scale is only 0.17 to 1.7 billion, yet it outperforms the larger Dream and LLaDA diffusion models in both Perplexity and Entropy metrics, demonstrating the potential for high efficiency in smaller models. 在对比测试中，FS-DFM 的参数规模仅为 0.17 至 1.7 亿，但在困惑度（Perplexity）和熵（Entropy）指标上均优于参数量更大的 Dream 与 LLaDA 扩散模型，展现出小模型高效能的潜力。

The research team stated that they will open-source the code and model checkpoints in the future to promote reproduction and research in related fields. 研究团队表示，未来将开放代码与模型检查点，以推动相关领域的复现与研究。

item.title: Google 紧急修复中：Android 存在可窃取聊天记录与验证码的新型漏洞
item.guid: Google-紧急修复中：Android-存在可窃取聊天记录与验证码的新型漏洞
item.description:
According to tech media Ars Technica, an academic research team recently disclosed a new attack method called 'Pixnapping,' capable of stealing two-factor authentication (2FA) codes, chat logs, and other sensitive information from Android devices in less than 30 seconds. 据科技媒体 Ars Technica 报道，学术研究团队近日披露了一种名为「Pixnapping」的新型攻击方式，能够在不到 30 秒的时间内窃取 Android 设备上的双重验证（2FA）验证码、聊天记录和其他敏感信息。

Researchers pointed out that a Pixnapping attack requires the user to install a malicious app beforehand, but this app does not need any system permissions. It can induce the target app to display sensitive content on the screen by calling Android interfaces. 研究人员指出，Pixnapping 攻击需要用户事先安装一款恶意应用，但该应用无需任何系统权限，即可通过调用 Android 接口诱导目标应用在屏幕上显示敏感内容。

Subsequently, the malicious app exploits the time difference in GPU rendering to reconstruct screen information pixel by pixel, thereby obtaining verification codes or message content. 随后， 恶意应用会利用 GPU 渲染的时间差来逐像素重建屏幕信息，从而获取验证码或消息内容。

Tests show that the attack has been successfully demonstrated on Google Pixel series and Samsung Galaxy S25. 测试显示，该攻击已在 Google Pixel 系列和三星 Galaxy S25 上成功演示。

In experiments on Pixel 6 to Pixel 9, the research team was able to recover a complete 6-digit verification code within a 30-second validity period, with a success rate of up to 73%. However, on the Galaxy S25, due to noise interference, the attack could not be completed within the time limit. 研究团队在 Pixel 6 至 Pixel 9 上的实验中，能够在 30 秒有效期内恢复出完整的 6 位验证码，成功率最高达 73%。不过，在 Galaxy S25 上由于噪声干扰，攻击未能在时限内完成。

Google stated that it has released some mitigation measures in the September Android Security Bulletin and plans to further fix the vulnerability in the December update. Google 表示，已在 9 月的 Android 安全公告中发布了部分缓解措施，并计划在 12 月的更新中进一步修复漏洞。

Currently, there is no evidence that this attack has been exploited in real-world environments. 目前，尚无证据显示该攻击已在现实环境中被利用。

Researchers emphasized that Pixnapping reveals the limitations of Android's inter-app isolation mechanisms, reminding users to exercise caution when installing applications. 研究人员强调，Pixnapping 揭示了 Android 应用间隔离机制的局限性，提醒用户在安装应用时保持谨慎。

item.title: Google 调整搜索广告呈现方式：统一分组并支持折叠
item.guid: Google-调整搜索广告呈现方式：统一分组并支持折叠
item.description:
According to The Verge, Google announced it is introducing a new feature for search results that allows users to hide promotional content after browsing. 据 The Verge 报道，Google 宣布正在为搜索结果引入一项新功能，允许用户在浏览后隐藏推广内容。

Currently, Google individually labels each paid result with a 'Promoted' tag on the search page. This update unifies these results into a collapsible section at the top of the page, displayed with a more prominent label. 目前，Google 在搜索页面中会为每条付费结果单独标注「推广」标签。此次更新将这些结果统一归类至页面顶部的可折叠区域，并以更醒目的标签显示。

When users scroll to the bottom of this section, they can click a button to hide promoted results. Once collapsed, only the 'Promoted' title remains; clicking again will expand them for viewing. 用户在滚动浏览至该区域底部时，可以点击按钮隐藏推广结果，折叠后仅保留「推广」标题，若再次点击则可展开查看。

Google stated that this update has been gradually rolled out to desktop and mobile. The company says this move aims to 'make navigation more convenient.' However, users still need to scroll past promotional content before they can choose to hide it. Google 表示，这一更新已在桌面端和移动端逐步推送。公司称此举旨在「让导航更加便捷」。不过，用户仍需先滚动经过推广内容，才能选择将其隐藏。

Over the years, Google has continuously adjusted how paid search results are presented. 多年来，Google 不断调整付费搜索结果的呈现方式。

As early as around 2020, Google changed the label from 'Ad' to 'Promoted' to reduce user resistance to ads. This change is seen as another attempt to strike a balance between user experience and advertising business. 早在 2020 年左右，Google 就将标签从「广告」改为「推广」，以减少用户对广告的抵触情绪。此次改动被视为在用户体验与广告业务之间寻求平衡的又一次尝试。

item.title: 下月起新车上牌可直接在网上完成
item.guid: 下月起新车上牌可直接在网上完成
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, yesterday, the Ministry of Public Security held a press conference in Beijing to announce that starting November 1st, a 'one-stop service' for new domestic passenger vehicle registration will be fully implemented nationwide. 据新华社报道， 昨天，公安部在京召开新闻发布会介绍，自 11 月 1 日起将在全国范围内全面推行国产小客车新车上牌「一件事」服务。

This measure integrates information such as vehicle sales invoices, purchase tax, and insurance, enabling full-process digital handling, so car buyers no longer need to submit paper documents. 该措施整合了车辆销售发票、购置税、保险等信息，实现全流程数字化办理，购车人无需再提交纸质材料。

A new vehicle registration module has been launched in the 'Traffic Management 12123' App, integrating functions such as vehicle selection, insurance purchase links, license plate selection, and registration. Car buyers can complete registration and licensing directly online without needing to visit the vehicle management office for inspection. 在「交管 12123」App 中已上线新车上牌模块，集成选车、购险链接、选号、上牌等功能，购车人可直接通过网络完成登记上牌，无需前往车管所验车。

It is understood that this reform is one of the 7 new measures under the Ministry of Public Security's 'Efficient Handling of One Matter' initiative. In addition to new vehicle registration, it also includes: 据了解，此次改革属于公安交管「高效办成一件事」的 7 项新措施之一，除新车上牌外，还包括：

    Online processing for lifting motor vehicle mortgage registration;

    Online processing for temporary license plates for oversized transport vehicles;

    Online application for replacement or renewal of motor vehicle registration certificates;

    Online transfer of motor vehicle transfer information;

    Convenient online processing of driver's license examination services;

    Online application for school bus driving qualifications.

The Ministry of Public Security stated that these measures will further enhance the digitalization and convenience of traffic management services, reduce the number of times people need to visit offices, and achieve the goal of 'more data running, less people running errands'. 公安部表示，这些措施将进一步提升交管服务的数字化、便捷化水平，减少群众跑动次数，实现「数据多跑路，群众少跑腿」。

item.title: 丰田多款概念车预告，世纪轿跑与卡罗拉纯电版引关注
item.guid: 丰田多款概念车预告，世纪轿跑与卡罗拉纯电版引关注
item.description:
Recently, Toyota unveiled several concept models ahead of the 2025 Japan Mobility Show. The overall design style breaks away from its previous conservative approach, showcasing a more aggressive visual impact. 日前，丰田在 2025 日本移动展前夕公布了多款概念车型，整体设计风格突破以往的保守路线，展现出更为激进的视觉冲击力。

Among them, the Toyota Century debuted its first two-door coupe version, featuring a vibrant red paint job and introducing a 'Crossover'-like ground clearance setting. 其中，丰田世纪首次推出双门轿跑版本，车身采用艳丽红色涂装，并引入类似「Crossover」的离地高设定。

The new car continues with horizontal light clusters and a gradient hexagonal grille, paired with the phoenix emblem, giving it an overall more GT sports car feel. 新车延续横置式灯组与渐层六角格栅，搭配凤凰厂徽，整体更具 GT 跑车气质。

Lexus, on its part, presented the 'LS Concept' six-wheel MPV concept car, featuring a 2-front, 4-rear wheel layout, retaining the family's spindle grille, and equipped with vertical light clusters and large sliding doors, emphasizing the possibilities for future luxury MPVs. 雷克萨斯方面，带来了「LS Concept」六轮 MPV 概念车，采用前 2 后 4 的布局，保留家族纺锤型格栅，并配备垂直灯组与大面积侧滑门，强调未来豪华 MPV 的可能性。

The Toyota main brand, meanwhile, focused on the Corolla concept car. The new car features a sharper design, with a charging port appearing on the front fender, hinting at a potential future all-electric version. 丰田主品牌则聚焦于卡罗拉概念车，新车造型更为犀利，前翼子板出现充电口，暗示未来或将推出纯电版本。

Additionally, Daihatsu, inspired by its classic 1959 model 'Midget', previewed the all-new 'Midget X' concept car. The new vehicle maximizes cabin and cargo space with its compact body, positioning itself for light personal mobility and light commercial scenarios. 此外，Daihatsu 以 1959 年的经典车款「Midget」为灵感，预告全新「Midget X」概念车。新车以袖珍车身实现车室与载物空间最大化，定位轻代步与轻型商用场景。

item.title: 特斯拉中国筹备「简化版」车型，最快 2026 年投产
item.guid: 特斯拉中国筹备「简化版」车型，最快-2026-年投产
item.description:
According to 36Kr, Tesla China is advancing two 'simplified' models, internally codenamed E41 and D50, which correspond to de-contented versions of the current Model Y and Model 3. 据 36 氪报道，特斯拉中国正在推进两款「简化版」车型，内部代号分别为 E41 和 D50，对应现款 Model Y 与 Model 3 的减配版本。

According to informed sources, some design and validation reports for the new vehicles directly reuse those of existing models, and they have now entered the validation testing phase, with production expected as early as 2026. 据知情人士透露，新车部分设计和验证报告直接沿用现有车型，目前已进入验证测试阶段，预计最快 2026 年投产。

In October this year, Tesla launched 'simplified' versions of the Model Y and Model 3 in the North American market, with starting prices of US$39,999 (approximately RMB 284,000) and US$36,990 (approximately RMB 263,000) respectively, about RMB 20,000 cheaper than previous models. 今年 10 月，特斯拉已在北美市场推出「简化版」Model Y 和 Model 3，起售价分别为 39,999 美元（约合人民币 28.4 万元）和 36,990 美元（约合人民币 26.3 万元），较此前车型便宜 2 万元左右。

The new cars have canceled or simplified over 20 configurations, including the front light bar, double-layer laminated glass, and electric seat adjustment. 新车取消或简化了 20 余项配置，包括车头贯穿灯带、双层夹胶玻璃、电动座椅调节等。

Subsequently, the simplified Model Y has landed on the market websites of Norway, Germany, and Sweden, and will officially launch from November to December, with a price 5,000 euros lower than the previous lowest version. 随后，简化版 Model Y 已登陆挪威、德国、瑞典市场网站，将于 11 月至 12 月正式上市，售价较此前最低版本低 5000 欧元。

However, market reaction has not been entirely positive. After Tesla released the simplified models in North America, its stock price once fell by about 4%, and its market value evaporated by US$65 billion. 不过，市场反应并不完全积极。特斯拉在北美发布简化版车型后，股价一度下跌约 4%，市值蒸发 650 亿美元。

According to The Verge, Tesla Cybertruck sales significantly declined in the third quarter of 2025. 另据 The Verge 报道，特斯拉 Cybertruck 销量在 2025 年第三季度大幅下滑。

Kelly Blue Book data shows that Tesla sold only 5,385 Cybertrucks in that quarter, a 63% decrease compared to the same period in 2024. 凯利蓝皮书数据显示，特斯拉在该季度仅售出 5,385 辆 Cybertruck，同比 2024 年同期下降 63%。

As of now, the cumulative sales for the full year 2025 are slightly over 16,000 units, far below Musk's previous prediction of 250,000 annual sales. 截至目前，2025 年全年累计销量略超 16,000 辆，远低于马斯克曾预测的年销 25 万辆。

item.title: 莫言：AI 生成内容应加不可去除标识，原创是新大众文艺关键
item.guid: 莫言：AI-生成内容应加不可去除标识，原创是新大众文艺关键
item.description:
According to The Paper, the 'New Popular Literature and Art Symposium' was recently held in Zibo, Shandong. 据澎湃新闻报道，日前，「新大众文艺座谈会」在山东淄博举行。

Mo Yan, Vice Chairman of the China Writers Association, stated at the conference that both new popular literature and serious literature are inseparable from a deep connection with life. Creators must establish 'direct and close' ties with reality, focusing on public concerns and social hot topics in their creations. 中国作协副主席莫言在会上表示，无论是新大众文艺还是严肃文艺，都离不开与生活的深刻联结。创作者必须与现实建立「直接而密切」的联系，将百姓关切与社会热点作为创作焦点。

At the same time, he called on AI developers to add indelible identifiers to AI-generated content so that users can easily distinguish it, encouraging originality and promoting literary and artistic innovation. 同时，他呼吁 AI 开发者为 AI 生成内容添加不可去除的标识，以便用户轻松辨识，鼓励原创，推动文艺创新。

Experts at the conference pointed out that emerging forms such as short videos, micro-dramas, and online literature are becoming important forces in the development of literature and art. The authentic experiences and 'earthy flavor' of amateur authors inject unique value into creation, while Shandong's rich cultural resources also provide fertile ground for new popular literature and art. 与会专家指出，短视频、微短剧、网络文学等新兴形态正成为文艺发展的重要力量。素人作者的真实体验与「泥土气息」为创作注入了独特价值，而山东丰富的文化资源也为新大众文艺提供了深厚土壤。

item.title: 💡 科幻作家郝景芳：任何声称某专业不会被 AI 淘汰的说法都不可信
item.guid: 💡-科幻作家郝景芳：任何声称某专业不会被-AI-淘汰的说法都不可信
item.description:
At the recently held "Yixi Youth · Education Forum", science fiction writer and founder of Tongxing Academy, Hao Jingfang, gave a speech, stating bluntly, "Don't ever believe anyone who tells you that studying a certain major will not be eliminated by AI in the future." 在近日举办的「一席少年 · 教育论坛」上，科幻作家、童行书院创始人郝景芳发表演讲，直言「任何跟你说，学某某专业将来不会被 AI 淘汰的，都绝对不要相信」。

Hao Jingfang pointed out that for questions with standard answers, AI performs far better than humans. If students only rely on exam-oriented education, they will inevitably face unemployment risks after graduation. 郝景芳指出，对于有标准答案的问题，AI 的表现远超人类，学生若仅依赖应试教育，毕业后势必面临失业风险。

She emphasized that the true value of humanity lies in answering questions without standard answers, that is, making choices and judgments in situations with multiple goals and values. 她强调， 人类真正的价值在于回答没有标准答案的问题，即在多目标、多价值的情境下进行选择与判断。

When discussing the impact of AI on creation and education, Hao Jingfang shared her personal practice: in the writing process of her new work "Folded Universe: Consuming Civilization", she used AI to assist in character setting and background construction, but the ultimate creativity and overall coordination were still led by humans. 在谈及 AI 对创作与教育的影响时，郝景芳分享了个人实践：她在新作《折叠宇宙：吞噬文明》的写作过程中，利用 AI 辅助人物设定与背景构建，但最终的创意与统筹仍由人类主导。

She believes that in the future, AI will take on more execution-oriented roles, while humans will need to possess leadership and project management capabilities. 她认为，未来 AI 将承担更多执行类岗位，而人类则需要具备统帅性与项目管理能力。

Hao Jingfang further pointed out that the development of AI is inevitable, and the key lies in how humans coexist with it. 郝景芳进一步指出，AI 的发展不可避免，关键在于人类如何与之共生。

In the future, in any professional field, if you can master AI and build upon its capabilities, you can actually surpass AI.

She called for the education system to reduce the burden of exam-oriented learning and instead cultivate students' creativity and leadership. 她呼吁教育体系应减少应试负担，转而培养学生的创造力与领导力。

item.title: 一加 15 全球首发搭载 「第三代东方屏」
item.guid: 一加-15-全球首发搭载-「第三代东方屏」
item.description:
Yesterday, at BOE's flexible OLED flagship new product launch event, BOE officially released the "Third Generation Oriental Screen". 昨天，在京东方柔性 OLED 旗舰新品发布会上，京东方正式发布了「第三代东方屏」。

This product, jointly launched by BOE, OPPO, and OnePlus, is claimed to be the world's first 165Hz high-resolution flexible screen, featuring true hardware 1nit dark night display, LTPO 2.0 adaptive refresh rate, and a 1.15mm ultra-narrow four-equal-side design. 该产品由京东方携手 OPPO、一加联合推出，号称是全球首块 165Hz 高分辨率柔性屏幕，具备真硬件 1nit 暗夜显示、LTPO 2.0 自适应变频以及 1.15mm 超窄四等边设计。

According to the official introduction, the "Third Generation Oriental Screen" has achieved 8 technological breakthroughs, set 9 world records, and is equipped with an exclusive self-developed Display P3 screen chip and new X3 luminous material, further enhancing brightness uniformity and color performance. 官方介绍称，「第三代东方屏」实现了 8 项技术突破，刷新 9 项世界纪录，搭载独家自研 Display P3 屏幕芯片和全新 X3 发光材料，进一步提升亮度均一性和色彩表现。

    Enhanced drive technology: Single-row pixel charging time is reduced to 1.3 microseconds, which is 2 times faster than the industry average, ensuring high refresh rate stability;

    Self-developed Display P3 chip: Transistor count increased by 1.3 times, higher operating frequency, more stable pixel brightness;

    New circuit design: Click response is 10ms faster than 120Hz screens, zero missed touches in millions of clicks, latency fluctuation reduced by 8 times;

    9 major display algorithms: Significantly improve brightness and color uniformity, bringing an immersive visual experience.

The OnePlus 15 will be the first model to feature the "Third Generation Oriental Screen", equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition mobile platform and an "aerospace-grade nano-ceramic metal" frame, and will be officially released in Shenzhen on October 14th at 14:30. 一加 15 将成为首款搭载「第三代东方屏」的机型，首批配备第五代骁龙 8 至尊版移动平台，并采用「航天级纳米瓷金属」中框，将于 10 月 14 日 14:30 在深圳正式发布。

The device will also debut a 165Hz ultra-high frame rate gaming ecosystem, supporting native 165fps operation for multiple mainstream mobile games including "Delta Force", "Arena Breakout", "Call of Duty Mobile", "League of Legends Mobile", and "Naruto". 该机还将首发 165Hz 超高帧游戏生态，支持包括《三角洲行动》《暗区突围》《使命召唤手游》《英雄联盟手游》《火影忍者》在内的多款主流手游原生 165 帧运行。

At the same time, OnePlus has also for the first time adapted 165Hz to leading applications such as WeChat, QQ, Xiaohongshu, and Weibo. 同时，一加还首次将 165Hz 适配至微信、QQ、小红书、微博等头部应用。

item.title: 京东回应与宁德时代、广汽合作「造车」：不直接涉及制造环节
item.guid: 京东回应与宁德时代、广汽合作「造车」：不直接涉及制造环节
item.description:
Yesterday, at the JD 11.11 Surprise Open Day, JD announced that it would partner with CATL and GAC Group to launch a "national good car", which will be officially released and exclusively sold during the Double 11 period. 昨天，在京东 11.11 惊喜开放日上，京东宣布将携手宁德时代、广汽集团推出一款「国民好车」，并将在双十一期间正式发布并独家销售。

JD stated that it will fully integrate the partners' advantageous capabilities in car manufacturing, battery sales and services, and promote the upgrading of automotive consumption through innovation in consumption, production, and customization models. 京东方面表示， 将全面整合合作方在造车、电池销售与服务等领域的优势能力，通过消费、生产、定制等模式创新，推动汽车消费升级。

According to reports, during the R&D process, this car model focused on the three dimensions most concerning to users – safety, charging efficiency and range, and price – striving to find the best balance. Currently, users can search for 'National Good Car' on the JD APP to pre-book a test drive. 据介绍，该车型在研发过程中重点围绕用户最关心的三大维度 —— 安全、充电效率与里程、价格，力求找到最佳平衡点。目前，用户可在京东 APP 搜索「国民好车」提前预约试驾。

According to Cailian Press, JD.com responded that this new car was jointly launched by three parties, with JD.com primarily providing user consumption insights and exclusive sales, not directly involved in the manufacturing process. 据财联社报道，京东方面回应称，这款新车是三方联合推出，京东主要提供用户消费洞察和独家销售， 不直接涉及制造环节。

item.title: 真我 GT8 Pro 首发理光 GR 联名，打造「街拍神器」
item.guid: 真我-GT8-Pro-首发理光-GR-联名，打造「街拍神器」
item.description:
Yesterday, the realme × RICOH GR Imaging Strategic Partnership launch event was held in Beijing. realme announced an imaging strategic partnership with RICOH GR, and the first new product, realme GT8 Pro, will feature the RICOH GR imaging system, positioned as a 'street photography artifact'. 昨天，真我 × 理光 GR 影像战略合作发布会在北京召开，真我宣布与理光 GR 达成影像战略合作，首发新品真我 GT8 Pro 将搭载理光 GR 影像系统，主打「街拍神器」定位。

According to the official introduction, realme and the RICOH GR team have been engaged in deep cooperation since 2021, undergoing dozens of rounds of co-creation, from sensor tuning, light and shadow algorithms to color science, striving to restore the 'RICOH GR flavor' on mobile phones. 官方介绍，真我与理光 GR 团队自 2021 年起就展开深度合作，从传感器调校、光影算法到色彩科学，历经数十轮共创，力求在手机上还原「理光 GR 味儿」。

The realme GT8 Pro's main camera features an anti-glare lens jointly developed with RICOH GR, boasting a 7P structure and a five-layer ultra-low reflection coating with reflectivity as low as 0.2%. Coupled with a 50-megapixel 1/1.56-inch large sensor, it achieves higher image quality and low distortion. 真我 GT8 Pro 主摄采用与理光 GR 联合打造的防眩光镜头，具备 7P 结构与五层超低反镀膜，反射率低至 0.2%，并配合 5000 万像素 1/1.56 英寸大底传感器，实现更高画质与低失真表现。

The model also offers two golden focal lengths, 28mm and 40mm, as well as an immersive viewfinder mode, further bringing it closer to the RICOH GR camera experience. 机型还提供 28mm 与 40mm 两大黄金焦段，以及沉浸式取景器模式，进一步贴近理光 GR 相机体验。

Furthermore, the realme GT8 Pro deeply replicates RICOH GR's five classic film tones, including Standard, Positive, Negative, Monochrome, and High-Contrast Black & White, and supports user-defined parameters. The device also features RICOH GR silk printing, watermarks, and exclusive albums to enhance the personalized experience. 此外，真我 GT8 Pro 还深度复刻理光 GR 的五大经典胶片影调，包括标准、正片、负片、单色与高对比黑白，并支持用户自定义参数。机身上也加入 RICOH GR 丝印、水印与专属相册，强化个性化体验。

In terms of performance, the realme GT8 Pro is equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition, the R1 gaming independent display chip, and a 2K 144Hz Sky Screen. It also features a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto lens and symmetrical dual speakers, positioning it as an annual flagship. The device will officially debut in October. 在性能方面，真我 GT8 Pro 搭载第五代骁龙 8 至尊版、电竞独显芯片 R1 与 2K 144Hz 苍穹屏，同时配备 2 亿像素潜望长焦与对称式双扬声器，定位年度旗舰。该机将于 10 月正式登场。

item.title: 蚂蚁发布万亿参数思考模型 Ring-1T：达奥数银牌水平
item.guid: 蚂蚁发布万亿参数思考模型-Ring-1T：达奥数银牌水平
item.description:
Early yesterday morning, Ant Group officially released the trillion-parameter reasoning model Ring-1T, simultaneously open-sourcing its model weights and training recipes. 昨天凌晨，蚂蚁集团正式发布万亿参数思考模型 Ring-1T，并同步开源模型权重与训练配方。

As the official version following Ring-1T-preview at the end of September, Ring-1T further enhanced natural language reasoning and general capabilities under large-scale verifiable reward reinforcement learning (RLVR) and RLHF training, demonstrating balanced performance across multiple task leaderboards. 作为继 9 月底 Ring-1T-preview 之后的正式版本，Ring-1T 在大规模可验证奖励强化学习（RLVR）与 RLHF 训练下，进一步提升了自然语言推理与通用能力，在多项任务榜单上表现均衡。

In terms of mathematical reasoning, the Bailing team integrated Ring-1T into the multi-agent framework AWorld to tackle IMO2025 (International Mathematical Olympiad) problems. 在数学推理方面，百灵团队将 Ring-1T 接入多智能体框架 AWorld，挑战 IMO2025（国际数学奥林匹克）赛题。

The results show that Ring-1T solved problems 1, 3, 4, and 5 in one go, achieving an overall level equivalent to an IMO silver medal, and becoming the first open-source system to reach the level of an International Mathematical Olympiad award. 结果显示，Ring-1T 一次性解出第 1、3、4、5 题，整体水平相当于 IMO 银牌，并成为首个达到国际奥数奖项水平的开源系统。

According to reports, Ring-1T underwent post-training based on the 1T base model of the Ling 2.0 architecture, combining multi-stage training of LongCoT-SFT + RLVR + RLHF, significantly enhancing its capabilities in complex reasoning, instruction following, and creative writing. 据介绍，Ring-1T 基于 Ling 2.0 架构的 1T base 模型进行后训练，结合 LongCoT-SFT + RLVR + RLHF 多阶段训练，显著增强了复杂推理、指令跟随与创意写作能力。

Currently, users can download the model from HuggingFace, ModelScope community, or experience it online via Ant Baibaoxiang. 目前，用户可在 HuggingFace、魔搭社区下载模型，或通过蚂蚁百宝箱在线体验。

item.title: 饿了么：将取消超时扣款，新版「服务分」机制已在多地试点
item.guid: 饿了么：将取消超时扣款，新版「服务分」机制已在多地试点
item.description:
Yesterday, Ele.me posted a response to questions regarding 'when will overtime deductions be canceled'. The platform stated that it is accelerating reforms, and in response to feedback from crowdsourced riders about overtime deductions, it has piloted a new 'service score' mechanism in cities such as Nantong, Changzhou, Jieyang, and Jingdezhen. 昨天，饿了么发文回应「超时扣款何时取消」相关问题。平台方面表示，正在抓紧推进改革，针对众包骑士反馈的超时扣款问题，已在南通、常州、揭阳、景德镇等城市试点推广新版「服务分」机制。

According to the introduction, the new mechanism replaces the original overtime deductions with methods such as 'deducting service points', aiming to achieve 'more work, more gain; better work, better gain'. The platform expects to cover more cities within October, gradually canceling overtime deduction penalties and promoting a shift from negative penalties to positive incentives. 根据介绍， 新机制通过「扣服务分」等方式取代原有的超时扣款，旨在实现「多劳多得、优劳优得」。 平台预计在 10 月内将覆盖更多城市，逐步取消超时扣款处罚，推动从负向处罚向正向激励的转变。

Previously, on September 10, the 2025 Ele.me Platform Algorithm and Labor Rules Negotiation Symposium was held in Shanghai. 此前，9 月 10 日，2025 年度「饿了么」平台算法和劳动规则协商恳谈会在上海召开。

First-line online delivery riders from across the country and enterprise representatives exchanged views on topics such as labor remuneration, rest and vacation, labor protection, and welfare benefits, and signed the '2025 Ele.me Platform Algorithm and Labor Rules Agreement'. 来自全国各地的一线网约配送员与企业代表就劳动报酬、休息休假、劳动保护、福利保障等议题展开交流，并签署了《2025 年度「饿了么」平台算法和劳动规则协议》。

In addition, Ele.me also plans to upgrade anti-fatigue rules and optimize the "forced offline" function to further ensure the physical and mental health of riders. 此外，饿了么还计划升级防疲劳规则、优化「强制下线」功能，以进一步保障骑手的身心健康。

item.title: 广州推动早茶立法：传统制作需 24 小时内完成
item.guid: 广州推动早茶立法：传统制作需-24-小时内完成
item.description:
According to China Newsweek, the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress Standing Committee recently released the "Guangzhou Morning Tea Inheritance and Protection Regulations (Draft Amendment · Solicitation of Comments)" to solicit public opinions, with a deadline of October 28. 据《中国新闻周刊》报道，广州市人大常委会近日公布《广州早茶传承保护规定（草案修改稿 · 征求意见稿）》，向社会公开征求意见，截止日期为 10 月 28 日。

The "Draft for Comment" proposes that operators must clearly indicate the preparation methods of morning tea on menus or other prominent locations, distinguishing between "traditional preparation methods" and "non-traditional preparation methods." 《征求意见稿》提出， 经营者需在菜单或其他显著位置明示早茶的制作方式，区分「传统方式制作」与「非传统方式制作」。

Among them, traditionally prepared morning tea is generally consumed within 24 hours of preparation. For the same food, differentiated pricing based on preparation methods is allowed. 其中，传统方式制作的早茶， 从制成到食用时间一般不超过 24 小时。 对于同一种食品，允许根据制作方式实行差异化定价。

In terms of talent cultivation, the draft proposes establishing a professional skill evaluation system for Guangzhou morning tea masters, carrying out star rating activities, and supporting vocational schools to offer relevant courses and cultivate morning tea master studios. 在人才培养方面，草案提出建立广州早茶师傅职业技能评价体系，开展星级认定活动，并支持职业学校开设相关课程，培育早茶大师工作室。

Industry insiders believe that this move helps protect consumers' right to know and promotes differentiated development in the morning tea industry between "intangible cultural heritage" and "fast food." Some old brands have also seen a market resurgence by leveraging made-to-order and traditional craftsmanship. 业内人士认为，此举有助于保障消费者知情权，推动早茶行业在「非遗化」与「快餐化」之间形成分化发展。一些老字号品牌也借助现点现做与古法工艺，迎来市场复兴。

In addition, the "Draft for Comment" also proposes establishing a "Guangzhou Classic Morning Tea Shop" evaluation mechanism, requiring selected shops to provide traditionally prepared morning tea and accept dynamic management. 此外，《征求意见稿》还提出设立「广州早茶经典店」评定机制，要求入选店铺必须提供传统方式制作的早茶，并接受动态管理。

item.title: 曾被称「星巴克劲敌」，85 度 C 多地现「闭店潮」
item.guid: 曾被称「星巴克劲敌」，85-度-C-多地现「闭店潮」
item.description:
Well-known bakery brand 85°C has recently seen large-scale store closures in many places, attracting consumer attention. The Hangzhou Qingchun Road store officially closed after more than ten years of operation, and the Binjiang store and Jiangcheng Road store have also successively ceased operations, with only 2 stores remaining open in Beijing. 知名烘焙品牌 85 度 C 近期在多地出现大规模闭店，引发消费者关注。杭州庆春路店在营业十余年后正式关门，滨江店、江城路店也相继停业，北京目前仅剩 2 家门店正常营业。

Many consumers left messages on social media saying "my youth is over," stating that this brand, which once required queuing to buy bread, carried their youthful memories and life fragments. 不少消费者在社交平台留言表示「爷青结」，称这家曾经需要排队才能买到面包的品牌，承载了他们的青春记忆与生活片段。

Public information shows that 85°C was founded in 2003 and entered the mainland market in 2007, expanding at a rate of nearly 100 stores per year. It reached its peak in store openings in 2018 and expanded its stores overseas. 公开资料显示，85 度 C 成立于 2003 年，2007 年进入大陆市场后曾以每年近 100 家的速度扩张，2018 年达到开店高峰，并将门店拓展至海外。

However, with the rise of local brands like Luxihe and Momo Dim Sum Bureau, and cross-industry ventures into baked goods by brands like Ruixing and Naixue's Tea, 85°C's "coffee + bakery" model has been impacted. 然而，随着泸溪河、墨茉点心局等本土品牌崛起，以及瑞幸、奈雪的茶等跨界推出烘焙产品，85 度 C 的「咖啡 + 烘焙」模式受到冲击。

The latest announcement shows that 85°C's parent company, Gourmet – KY, will close over 40 mainland stores in 2025, accounting for more than one-tenth of its total, marking the largest adjustment in nearly five years. 最新公告显示，85 度 C 母公司美食 – KY 将在 2025 年关闭超过 40 家大陆门店，占比超过十分之一，创下近五年来最大幅度调整。

The company stated that this move is to cope with sluggish consumer spending and intensified competition, aiming to "stop the bleeding" by optimizing store structure and supply chain. 公司表示，此举是为应对消费力低迷和竞争加剧，通过优化门店结构和供应链来「止血」。

Currently, 85°C's mainland business has been operating at a loss for two consecutive years, with a loss of nearly 400 million New Taiwan Dollars (approximately 93 million RMB) in 2024. If no adjustments are made, the loss may further expand in 2025. 目前，85 度 C 大陆业务已连续两年亏损，2024 年亏损接近 4 亿元新台币（约合人民币 9300 万元），若不调整，2025 年亏损或将进一步扩大。

item.title: 史蒂芬 · 金原著改编，《猎杀游戏》全新预告发布
item.guid: 史蒂芬-·-金原著改编，《猎杀游戏》全新预告发布
item.description:
Paramount's action blockbuster "The Running Man" (tentative title) has released a new trailer and poster. The film is adapted from Stephen King's novel of the same name, directed by Edgar Wright, starring Glen Powell, Josh Brolin, Lee Pace, Colman Domingo, and others, and is scheduled to be released in North America on November 14, 2025. 派拉蒙动作巨制《猎杀游戏》（暂译）发布全新预告与海报，影片改编自史蒂芬 · 金同名小说，由埃德加 · 赖特执导，格伦 · 鲍威尔、乔什 · 布洛林、李 · 佩斯、科尔曼 · 多明戈等主演，定档 2025 年 11 月 14 日北美上映。

The film is set in a near-future dystopian society, where a reality show called "The Running Man" centers on a bloody survival competition. Contestants must survive for 30 days while being hunted by professional killers, with the entire process broadcast live to satisfy viewers' morbid curiosity. 影片设定在近未来的反乌托邦社会，一档名为「猎杀游戏」的真人秀以血腥生存竞赛为核心，参赛者必须在职业杀手的追杀下存活 30 天，过程全程直播，观众以此满足猎奇欲望。

Director Edgar Wright is known for his fast-paced editing, violent aesthetics, and black humor, having directed works such as "Baby Driver" and "Shaun of the Dead." 导演埃德加·赖特以快节奏剪辑、暴力美学和黑色幽默见长，曾执导《极盗车神》《僵尸肖恩》等作品。

This new film not only continues his style but also emphasizes actors performing high-risk action scenes themselves. Glen Powell, following "Top Gun: Maverick," once again challenges real-action filming. 此次新片不仅延续其风格，还强调演员亲自完成高危动作场面，格伦·鲍威尔继《壮志凌云：独行侠》后再度挑战实拍动作。

item.title: 亲情片《带你回家》定档 10 月 25 日
item.guid: 亲情片《带你回家》定档-10-月-25-日
item.description:
The realistic family film "Bring You Home" today released its "When I Grow Up" themed trailer and poster. 现实主义亲情电影《带你回家》今日发布「等我长大了」主题预告及海报。

The film is directed by He Boya, starring Wang Zhen'er and Li Ping. This trailer focuses on the strong contrast between childhood promises and adult reality, showcasing the evolution of Chinese parent-child relationships. 影片由贺伯亚执导，王真儿、李萍主演，此次预告片以童年承诺与成年现实的强烈反差为核心，展现中国式亲子关系的演变。

In the film, the daughter, as a child, made promises like "When I grow up, I'll pick you up and drop you off at work every day," but as an adult, due to conflicts, she sent her mother to a nursing home. This emotional disparity deeply resonated with the audience. 片中，女儿幼时许下「等我长大了，我要天天接送你上下班」等诺言，却在成年后因矛盾将母亲送往养老院，情感落差直击观众内心。

The film also uses Alzheimer's disease as a turning point to explore the possibilities of forgetting and reconciliation. The creators hope that through the contrast of "from making empty promises to breaking them," it will provoke the audience to deeply reflect on family affection and commitment. 影片还以阿尔茨海默症为转折，探讨遗忘与和解的可能性。创作者希望通过「从画饼到食言」的对比，引发观众对亲情与承诺的深思。

"Bring You Home" will officially be released on October 25th. The filmmakers expressed their hope that the audience will find their childhood selves on screen, the ones who said "forever together." 《带你回家》将于 10 月 25 日正式上映，片方表示期待观众在银幕上找回童年那个说「永远在一起」的自己。

item.title: 《火种》全国首映礼举行：10 月 16 日起登陆院线
item.guid: 《火种》全国首映礼举行：10-月-16-日起登陆院线
item.description:
The national premiere of "The Spark," a major revolutionary historical film directed by Chen Jianfei, written by Zhou Zhentian, with Wu Shutong as chief producer, and starring Fu Dalong and Jiang Wu, was held in Beijing. 由陈剑飞执导、周振天编剧，武姝彤担任总制片人，富大龙、姜武领衔主演的重大革命历史题材电影「火种」在北京举办全国首映礼。

It is reported that the film adopts a dual-timeline narrative structure, on one hand showcasing Comrade Li Dazhao's heroic deeds of persistent struggle under "white terror" until his valiant sacrifice; on the other hand, it depicts the process of public security officers apprehending the true culprit over 100 days in the early days of the New China. 据悉，影片采用双时空叙事结构，一方面展现李大钊同志在「白色恐怖」下坚持斗争、直至英勇就义的壮烈事迹；另一方面描绘新中国成立初期公安干警历时 100 天缉捕真凶的过程。

The two narrative lines complement each other, highlighting the inheritance of the revolutionary spark and the inevitability of historical justice. 两条叙事线相互映衬，凸显革命火种的传承与历史正义的必然。

At the premiere, Ms. Li Lequn stated: "'The Spark' is a revolutionary martyr-themed film with a unique and innovative perspective. We thank the creative team for completing the production with full faith and responsibility, allowing contemporary red cultural works to shine." 首映礼上，李乐群女士表示：「火种是视角独特、有新意的革命先烈题材电影，感谢主创团队满怀信念与责任感完成制作，让当代红色文艺作品绽放光彩。」

Director Chen Jianfei emphasized that the film strives to break away from the "grand narrative" mode of red themes, focusing on the characters themselves and conveying the spirit of Dazhao. 导演陈剑飞则强调，影片力求跳出红色题材「宏大叙事」的模式，聚焦人物本身，传递大钊精神。

The film "The Spark" will be released in People's Cinema Line theaters nationwide starting October 16th. 电影「火种」将于 10 月 16 日起登陆全国人民院线影城。
